category_subtitle: Seahawks vs Patriots Tomorrow — Get Your Snacks Ready!

rounds.pro_tip: FOOD IMPERFECTION: Real nachos and wings have grease stains, uneven sauce, and varied portion sizes. AI party food looks impossibly photogenic.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — buffalo wing platter with celery and blue cheese (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: SAUCE PHYSICS: Real buffalo sauce pools, drips, and has varied thickness. AI sauce often looks like smooth orange paint uniformly applied.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic overhead shot of buffalo chicken wings platter with celery sticks, blue cheese dip, ranch, messy casual table setting'

rounds.pro_tip: GLASS REFLECTIONS: Real beer glasses reflect their environment — room lights, nearby objects. AI glass reflections are often random bright spots.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — packed sports bar with big screens showing football (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: SCREEN CONTENT: Look at what's on the TVs. AI often generates gibberish or impossible game imagery on screens — distorted scoreboards, melted players.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic crowded sports bar interior, multiple big screen TVs showing football, fans cheering, neon beer signs, warm lighting'

rounds.pro_tip: CONDENSATION: Real cold drinks show natural water droplet patterns. AI tends to make droplets too uniform or places them incorrectly.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — tailgate party in stadium parking lot (DALL-E 3)
rounds.pro_tip: LICENSE PLATES: Check license plates in parking scenes. AI generates random symbols that look vaguely like plates but never show real state formats.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic tailgate party, pickup trucks, portable grill smoking, folding chairs, coolers, football fans in jerseys, parking lot'

rounds.pro_tip: LABEL AUTHENTICITY: Real product labels are crisp with readable text and recognizable brands. AI labels are often the giveaway — blurry text, invented logos.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — fresh guacamole with chips and game day spread (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: AVOCADO TEXTURE: Real guacamole has chunky, varied texture with visible onion bits and cilantro. AI guacamole is often too smooth and unnaturally green.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic guacamole bowl with tortilla chips, salsa, seven-layer dip, game day snack table spread, casual home setting'

rounds.pro_tip: EDGE DETAIL: Real photos have clean, natural edges where objects meet. AI sometimes produces halos, smudging, or unnatural blending at object boundaries.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — football jerseys hanging in a row at shop (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: NUMBERS & LETTERS: Real jerseys have consistent fonts and proper numbers. AI jerseys often show distorted numbers, impossible player names, or inconsistent styling.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic row of NFL-style football jerseys hanging on rack in sports shop, various colors, numbered, folded below, retail display'
